nidhoggr.name: Níðhöggr
nidhoggr.title: Quieting Dose
nidhoggr.description: A member of Yggdrasill's Healing Hands who prefers to remain intoxicated in order to keep her true feelings from coming to the surface.

Castle Hall: The injured wail and cry, but they get nice and quiet real quick if there's a few drops of poison involved.
Poison is different from medicine. It can paralyze a person and make their pain go away in an instant.
My power over poison is a gift from my pops. I like to think it's proof that I'm his favorite.
I'm better than Hræsvelgr, to be sure. I mean, she saved me once way back when, but these days...
Ratatoskr is easily overwhelmed and clumsy as a newborn deer. But I guess she's never boring.
Visit: *hic* I'm...Níðhöggr. I'm here to... Uh... What was it again? Oh yeah! I'm Níðhöggr.
Level: I'm the Quieting Dose. That's me.
*hic* Heh. I'm starting to feel good...
Summon: I am the Quieting Dose, Níðhöggr. Forget about family, I just wanna relax and have a good time... *hic*
Learn Skill: Uh... For me? Wh-what the heck? Why are you being nice? You're throwing me off.
Confession:
Ah... *hic* Hey, Summoner, why don't you take a bite too?
Family? They're just people ya can't stand but can't cut out of your life 'cause you're too connected.
One time, I went to heal some people with Hræsvelgr and Ratatoskr. Wanna hear about it?
No, you don't. It was a rough time.
That's why I'm going it alone now. I'm good like this. Seriously. But...
Ah no! I'm not going there! I've had too much of this fruit, but...maybe I I need just one more.
Status: Níðhöggr! That's meee! I handle poisons for... For... Ah, I lost my train of thought there.
Care for a bite? Juuust a nibble? You might like it...
Ahh... Let me savor this bite for a moment...
Ugh. Indulge one day, regret it the next...
Hræsvelgr hates fun. Always sooo...on edge.
Ratatoskr can make her own choices, y'know?
And this can help you forget your troubles—for a while, at least...

laeradr.name: Læraðr
laeradr.title: Quieting Heart
laeradr.description: Leader of the Healing Hands of Yggdrasill. He is known to control people's hearts.

Castle Hall: To heal those who suffer throughout the nine realms... That was once the role of the Healing Hands.
The first life I took was that of a king. I transformed my power, and then delivered him to madness and death.
It is quite simple. I transform the mortal heart how I please—be it into a state of misery or peace.
I once had a family... Though perhaps that, too, is a falsehood.
Visit: You must be [S]. I will remember that.
Level: To quiet hearts... That is what I do.
Tell me, shall I be pleased or shall I be disappointed?
I apologize. I have failed to meet your expectations.
Summon: I am Læraðr, leader of the Healing Hands and of the Quieting Hands. Which me do you prefer?
Learn Skill: How shall I offer my gratitude? Would you like me to transform your heart?
Confession:
My children...have all died...
No replacements will ever satisfy the longing in my heart. I could never truly love those who are not mine.
Of course, they have loved me... That is how I made them.
It is a simple thing, to transform a heart. I could even transform my own to be filled with joy.
However, I shall remain as I am, harboring the sadness of losing my family, suffering from my mistakes.
Status: I am Læraðr. I was once leader of the Healing Hands.
I know the techniques used to move the mortal heart—to soothe it, to crush it—all at my will.
To heal a heart is to transform it. I select the form it takes.
Whom do you think would make a truly terrifying assassin? I wonder...
At the count of three, you will be at my command. One, two...
Peace, and family... Those two things are all I've ever desired.
I see the weight that sits on your heart. I could help to lift it, you know...
